# Des Moines Insider - AI-Friendly Site Guide

## Site Overview
Des Moines Insider is the comprehensive digital guide for discovering events, restaurants, attractions, and family activities in Des Moines, Iowa. We provide AI-powered recommendations, real-time updates, and curated local insights.

## Main Content Sections

### Events
- Real-time event discovery and recommendations
- Concerts, festivals, food events, and cultural happenings
- Smart filtering by date, location, category, and price
- AI-enhanced event descriptions and recommendations

### Restaurants 
- Complete restaurant directory for Des Moines metro area
- New restaurant opening tracking and alerts
- Cuisine types, price ranges, and location-based filtering
- Review aggregation and rating systems

### Attractions
- Family-friendly activities and attractions
- Tourist destinations and local hidden gems
- Seasonal activities and year-round attractions
- Accessibility information and visitor tips

### Playgrounds
- Comprehensive playground directory for families
- Equipment types, age recommendations, and safety ratings
- Location-based search with amenities information
- User reviews and photo galleries

## Geographic Coverage
Primary coverage: Des Moines, Iowa metropolitan area
Extended coverage: 50-mile radius including West Des Moines, Ankeny, Urbandale, Johnston, Clive, Waukee, and surrounding communities

## Key Features
- AI-powered personalized recommendations
- Real-time event and restaurant data updates
- Smart search and filtering capabilities
- Mobile-optimized responsive design
- User authentication and personalized dashboards

## Data Sources
- Official venue websites and event calendars
- Restaurant management systems and social media
- Municipal recreation departments
- Community event organizers
- User-submitted content and reviews

## Contact Information
Website: https://desmoinssider.com
Email: info@desmoinssider.com
Service Area: Des Moines, Iowa and surrounding metropolitan area

## Content Freshness
- Events: Updated daily
- Restaurants: Updated weekly
- Attractions: Updated monthly
- Playgrounds: Updated quarterly

This site serves residents and visitors seeking authentic local experiences in Des Moines, Iowa.
